/usr/bin/c++    -rdynamic CMakeFiles/mytest1_glfw.dir/main.o  -o mytest1_glfw   -L/lib/glad/Release  -L/lib/glfw/Release  -L/lib/freeglut/Release  -L/lib/freeimage/Release  -L/lib/glew/Release  -L/lib/glm/Release  -Wl,-rpath,/lib/glad/Release:/lib/glfw/Release:/lib/freeglut/Release:/lib/freeimage/Release:/lib/glew/Release:/lib/glm/Release -lGL -lGLU -gl -pthread -ldl -Wl,-Bstatic -lglad -lglfw3 -lGLEW -lglut -lfreeimage -lglm_static -Wl,-Bdynamic
